Nov. 20, 1983 D Pilkington Northern Open (Section B)
Northern Open (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Northern Open wilkinson-northern-open-section-b
Test Piece Contest
Introduction and Allegro
Theatre Royal, St. Helens rizes - 1st £130 and trophy, 2nd £90 and cup, 3rd £70 and cup. 6 bands competed.
Feb. 3, 2012, 11:01 a.m. June 27, 2016, 9:43 a.m.
1 Warren Band Duncan Beckley
2 Kidlington Silver Terry Brotherhood
3 Orrell Silver Trevor Halliwell
Unknown Result Parr (St. Helens) Band Bob Kerwick
